PersistenceManager
public class XmlPersistence
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceManager

Class that handles the PersistenceManagerImpl type Type that writes the System's database

Author:
Arthur de Souza Ribeiro, Jose Laerte, Raquel Rolim, Raissa Sarmento

                          int occurrence)
Description copied from interface: PersistenceManager
Method that gets a User Object found by the given name and occurrence. The occurrence value determines which user to return in case of multiple users in which the names match the parameter name

Parameters:

occurrence - - number to determine the user to return

saveUser

public void saveUser(User user,
                     java.lang.String userName)
Description copied from interface: PersistenceManager
Saves the user in the database. If the userName already exists: overrides the file. Otherwise it creates a new file.

Specified by:
saveUser in interface PersistenceManager
Parameters:
user - - User Object that contains the data to be saved.
userName - - User's userName. Which dictates the file name.
See Also:
